name: ~ Ｖｏｌｃａｎｉｃ ~
description:
~ Ｖｏｌｃａｎｉｃ ~

 ======================================= 

New game ★ Eᴍᴏᴊɪ Dᴀꜱʜ ★ https://madrid2030.itch.io/584826968

 ======================================= 

Welcome to Volcanic! You're a little Volcano, try to above meteorites and spikes! ======================================= 

This game was made by » M2030 Games « This time was made by @madrid2030. It isn't generic, so coments saying that it's generic will be removed. Many people is saying that if you touch lava you don't die... That's because the "lava" isn't lava, it's the ground, based on lava, yes, but when you touch it it's supposed that you don't have to die... 

======================================= 

Instructions: 

★ Move with arrows keys or w,a,s,d. 

★ Two different types of modes. 

★ Obstacles Rush: Avoid spikes jumping. [1 Point per second] 

★ Fly Mode: Avoid Falling Meteorites. [1 Point per second] Also, if you click space bar and you touch a meteorite, you get 5 points! *** THE METEORIE DOESN'T HAS TO DISSAPEAR*** 

★ 3 Lives on each type of mode. 

★ Click to change your skin. 

★ Updates sprite: h to next, click to close 

★ Developer list/sprite: click to close ======================================= 

Credits: 

★ Inspiration: @kevin_eleven_1234 

★ Sounds: @QuaXX & @kevin_eleven_1234 

★ Code: 100% by @madrid2030 

★ Art: 100% by @madrid2030 

★ Music: Plugged - @-Xaf / Masked Heroes - Ventexto / Tobu - Candyland PaperAirplaneBoy - Cherry Bomb
